price: 57. Ou qu’elle ne dise : « Si Allah m’avait guidée, j’aurais été du nombre des gens pieux ! »
arabic: أَوۡ تَقُولَ لَوۡ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هَدَىٰنِي لَكُنتُ مِنَ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: aw taqūla law anna al-laha hadānī lakuntu mina al-mutaqīna
